plot outline: Neha (Deepa Sannidhi) is a frustrated girl as her romance with JD and Preetham turns sour. After a suicide attempt, she comes to her sister's house to forget her past experiences. But Vinay, who calls himself Vinny, winner and bajigar, impresses her with his witty talks and mannerisms. He also weaves a story and tells her that he was part of romantic drama with the two boys. Vinay, as per the wishes of Neha, also brings Vasundhara (Vinaya Prasad) and Col Cariappa (Anant Nag), who were staying single, together through his witty ways. This makes Neha trust him. But later she comes to know that Vinay was also a cheat who played with her emotions to win her heart by cooking up stories. The story takes a curious, but an interesting turn from here.
title: Sakkare
